page.title: 03 MORE CHANGES
page.content: Northgate Street with its cobbled pavements,had a{cinema}with silent films,shops,cottages,a lodging house frequented by tramps and the town library(now flats).In the last15years, Tower Street's chapel,{cottages}and shops have been replaced by warden_ controlled flats.The{Walk house}car park has replaced the lovely house that stood near the old town wall. Another car park occupies the area where{Castle Street}houses were.In the Castle Green, there are no longer swings and see_saws where children played and watched bonfires and circuses.For many years, archaeologists have been excavating this area.Other modern town buildings are the dentists' surgery,Tax offices, the library in Madford Lane and the Fire Station in Westgate Street.The cinema of the 1930s has just closed.
